B&G Foods to Present at Investor Conferences in June
B&G Foods, Inc. May 27, 2015 3:28 PM
?
Done
PARSIPPANY, N.J.--(BUSINESS WIRE)--
B&G Foods, Inc. ( BGS ) announced today that the Company will be       presenting at the following investor conferences in June:
On Tuesday, June 2, 2015, the Company will present at the Stephens         Spring Investment Conference at the New York Palace Hotel in New York,         N.Y. The presentation will begin at 2:00 p.m. Eastern Time.
On Tuesday, June 9, 2015, the Company will present at the Piper         Jaffray 35th Annual Consumer Conference at the New York         Palace Hotel in New York, N.Y. The presentation will begin at 9:40         a.m. Eastern Time.
On Thursday, June 11, 2015, the Company will present at the Barclays         High Yield Bond and Syndicated Loan Conference at The Broadmoor in         Colorado Springs, Colo. The presentation will begin at 11:30 a.m.         Eastern Time.
Investors and interested parties may listen to the live webcasts of       these presentations by visiting the investor relations section of the       Company’s website at http://ir.bgfoods.com at the appropriate times. Replays of the webcasts will be available       following the conclusion of the presentations.
About B&G Foods, Inc.
B&G Foods and its subsidiaries manufacture, sell and distribute a       diversified portfolio of high-quality, branded shelf-stable foods across       the United States, Canada and Puerto Rico. Based in Parsippany, New       Jersey, B&G Foods’ products are marketed under many recognized brands,       including Ac’cent, B&G, B&M, Baker’s Joy, Bear Creek Country Kitchens, Brer Rabbit, Canoleo, Cary’s, Cream of Rice, Cream of Wheat, Devonsheer, Don       Pepino, Emeril’s, Grandma’s Molasses, JJ Flats, Joan       of Arc, Las Palmas, MacDonald’s, Maple Grove Farms, Molly McButter, Mrs. Dash, New York Flatbreads, New       York Style, Old London, Original Tings, Ortega, Pirate’s       Booty, Polaner, Red Devil, Regina, Rickland       Orchards, Sa-són, Sclafani, Smart Puffs, Spring       Tree, Sugar Twin, Trappey’s, TrueNorth, Underwood, Vermont Maid and Wright’s. B&G Foods also sells and       distributes Static Guard, a household product brand.
